ogDescription: watch the first person to climb yosemite's el capitan 3,200 wall of granite - without a rope or harness.#smarthernews #fearlessfriday #freesolo

card_1.cardText:
> Watch the first person to climb Yosemite’s El Capitan 3,200 wall of granite – WITHOUT a rope or harness.

[Watch Now](https://www.youtube.com/embed/urRVZ4SW7WU?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=1&rel=0)

card_10.cardText:
Alex Honnold (33) completed this amazing feat June 2017. His journey is featured in a National Geographic documentary entitled "Free Solo." It hits theaters on Friday, September 28th.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-09-28-yosemite-el-capitan/)

body: • Exclusive: Climber Completes the Most Dangerous Rope-Free Ascent Ever: https://www.nationalgeographic.com/adventure/features/athletes/alex-honnold/most-dangerous-free-solo-climb-yosemite-national-park-el-capitan/
